attributes.action: Resign his post without further delay to avoid damage to our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You have been a disastrous Chancellor while in office.  You have now ruined our country as Prime Minister.  

The honorable thing you can now do is to resign immediately and let someone more capable take over.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
